title: internal compiler error: cannot relate bound regon

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust use std::{thread, time}; use cursive::backend::Backend; use cursive::views::Canvas; use cursive::*; use cursive::event::Key; mod sprite; use sprite::AnimationGroup; use sprite::{Sprite, Animation}; mod gameobject; use gameobject::*; fn main() { let mut tick:usize = 0; // tick incriments on refresh let mut siv = Cursive::default(); // load cursive and set global theme siv.load_toml(include_str!("theme.toml")).unwrap(); siv.set_global_callback(Key::Backspace, |s| s.quit()); // quit on backspace //cursive backend let back_end = backends::try_default().unwrap(); let mut runner = CursiveRunner::new(siv, back_end); //original code, Animation loads //a series of images in dir let anim = Action{ animation:Animation::new("./path/to/dir".to_owned(), 32) }; // canvas that draws ascii image to terminal let canvas = Canvas::new( (&anim, tick)).with_draw( | data:(&Action, &usize), printer:&Printer | { printer.print_styled( XY::new(32, 32), // Action::view(action tick) -> SpannedString Action::view(data.0, data.1.clone())); } ); // add canvas layer to cursive obj siv.add_layer(canvas); //global refresh 1/16s let refresh_rate = time::Duration::from_millis(125); let mut now = time::Instant::now(); //main loop while runner.is_running() { if now.elapsed().as_millis() > refresh_rate.as_millis(){ tick += 1; now = time::Instant::now(); runner.step(); runner.refresh(); }else{} } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.2 (9eb3afe9e 2023-03-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0 commit-date: 2023-03-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.68.2 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_infer/src/infer/region_constraints/mod.rs:568:17: cannot relate bound region: ReLateBound(DebruijnIndex(0), BoundRegion { var: 0, kind: BrNamed(DefId(0:114 ~ cli_game[8b65]::main::'_), '_) }) <= '_#17r thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:987:33 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f2b04d6659a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::ha271a8a7e1f3d4ef at
